ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11569 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.191"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:11371)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11374)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11372)/@code="77157-6" Response mode descriptors (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:11373)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:11376), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ResponseModeQualifier 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.106 DYNAMIC (CONF:11375)
NEMSIS Trace: eResponse.24 (Additional Response Mode Descriptors)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:11371)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11374)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11372)/@code="77157-6" Response mode descriptors (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:11373)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:11376), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ResponseModeQualifier 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.106 DYNAMIC (CONF:11375)
NEMSIS Trace: eResponse.24 (Additional Response Mode Descriptors)

body.codeblock: <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.191"/> <code code="77157-6" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="Response mode descriptors"/> <value xsi:type="CD"/> </observation>
